originalText.text: Dr. Gordon is the best dentist I’ve ever had. He’s always punctual and gives you direct attention, no matter what questions you ask him. He’s kind and funny as well. Always provides you with knowledge on what procedures you need and doesn’t try to sell you on things you don’t. Very trustworthy. The whole office is also really kind. I’ve missed a few appointments and they still welcome me back with open arms

originalText.text: Dr. Gordon has been my dentist for nearly 20 years and he is the best. He has taken care of my kids' teeth their entire lives and has an incredibly good chair-side manner with them. Love this guy!  Who says that about a dentist? Seriously he's that good.

text.text: Dr. Gordon has been my dentist for nearly 20 years and he is the best. He has taken care of my kids' teeth their entire lives and has an incredibly good chair-side manner with them. Love this guy!  Who says that about a dentist? Seriously he's that good.

originalText.text: Dr. Gordon is a fantastic dentist who provides excellent care to his patients. He has a wealth of knowledge and expertise, and is extremely attentive, making sure to listen to each patient's individual needs and concerns. He takes the time to thoroughly explain procedures and treatments, ensuring that you are comfortable and informed every step of the way. I would highly recommend Dr. Gordon to anyone in search of a top-notch dentist!

originalText.text: Dr Gordon is a fantastic dentist! He is very thorough and gentle, I have felt in very good hands since I arrived in NYC! Everyone who works at the clinic are great - my experiences at the dentists are a lot less stressful because of it! Highly recommend

text.text: Dr Gordon is a fantastic dentist! He is very thorough and gentle, I have felt in very good hands since I arrived in NYC! Everyone who works at the clinic are great - my experiences at the dentists are a lot less stressful because of it! Highly recommend

originalText.text: Dr Gordon recently treated me for repair of a very old filling. It was the most pleasant and positive dental experience I have ever had as a dental patient. Dr. Gordon is extremely kind, caring and gentle, which is evidenced by his impeccable chair side manner. After carefully examining my tooth, he thoroughly addressed all my concerns and questions, and explained all my treatment options in detail. He even threw in a few jokes along the way to keep the visit light and fun. Dr. Gordon demonstrated that he is a very experienced, knowledgeable, and skilled clinician, and knows what he is talking about. I felt at ease and reassured from start to finish that I was receiving the best care and treatment possible. The entire procedure was efficient and painless, including the numbing injection with Novocaine. Once the numbing wore off, my mouth felt totally normal like nothing had even happened. No soreness or pain whatsoever. I highly recommend Dr. Gordon to anyone seeking high quality and personalized dental care with a gentle touch.
